projectPurpose: To provide a user-friendly, fast, and modern command-line interface (CLI) tool for making HTTP requests, serving as a performant alternative to tools like HTTPie while maintaining a similar, intuitive syntax.
mainFeatures: Available as a single statically linked binary

marketPositioning: xh is positioned as a performant and user-friendly command-line HTTP client. It directly competes with other CLI tools like curl and HTTPie, aiming to offer a faster alternative to HTTPie while retaining its intuitive syntax. Its key advantages are its speed due to being written in Rust and its easy distribution as a single binary. It serves developers and system administrators who prioritize command-line workflows, speed, and ease of installation over the graphical interfaces offered by tools like Postman and Insomnia.
